name: Part Time Hero
description:
Be the greatest hero! 

Train with Kamerlin and help all the inhabitants with their tasks. Fight your enemies to save Questville from destruction. Play alone or with friends. Use recipes to create the differents order and win your rivals.

  • Help Tario in his tavern.
  • Help Rhiron in his smithy.
  • Play with a friend in co-op or fight another rival team.
  • Beat your friends in the battle to be the greatest hero of all!

ONLINE ROOMS AVAILABLE!! (Max. 20 users)

Languages available:

  • English
  • Spanish
  • Chinesse

These executables are a alpha version under development.

ENJOY!

Created by 

Follow us in Twitter: @C404Games

Thanks for playing our game!
